original_text: One day, while Jesus was teaching in someone's house, many people were sitting there. Some of them were Pharisees. Other people were teachers of God's Law. They had come from many villages in Galilee, and from Judea and Jerusalem. The power of the Lord was there with Jesus to make sick people well.
korean_text: 하루는 가르치실 때에 갈릴리의 각 마을과 유대와 예루살렘에서 온 바리새인과 율법교사들이 앉았는데 병을 고치는 주의 능력이 예수와 함께 하더라

sentences.original_text: One day, while Jesus was teaching in someone's house
sentences.korean_translation: 어느 날, 예수님께서 어떤 사람의 집에서 가르치고 계실 때

sentences.original_text: Other people were teachers of God's Law
They had come from many villages in Galilee
The power of the Lord was there with Jesus
sentences.korean_translation: 주님의 권능이 예수님과 함께 그곳에 있었습니다
